title: The Spirit and the Mouse (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Ever wanted to be a tiny mouse? No? Well, now’s your chance anyway! This week, the Epic Games Store is giving away The Spirit and the Mouse! It’s a charming narrative adventure where you scurry around the cozy French village of Sainte-et-Claire as - yep, you guessed it - a mouse. That’s right, you’ll be solving problems, playing mini-games, and generally living your best mouse life!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library
